Key Match Events: Sri Lanka's Sadeera Samarawickrama scored 91* and was chosen as the player of the match.
Dilshan Madushanka and Kasun Rajitha took 4 wickets each for Sri Lanka.
Sybrand Engelbrecht scored 70 runs for the Netherlands.
Logan van Beek scored 59 runs for the Netherlands.
Sri Lanka won the match by 5 wickets with 10 balls remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka registered their first win in the ongoing ICC Men's ODI World Cup 2023.
Sri Lanka moved up to number 9 in the ICC points tally with 2 points.
Despite winning, Sri Lanka is below the Netherlands in the points table due to Net Run Rate (NRR) difference.
